namelist.namelist_summary:
############################################################################### namelist_Evapotranspiration.xml
Description General namelist to compute global contour plots of Evapotranspiration
Authors Martin Evaldsson (SMHI, Sweden - Martin.Evaldsson@smhi.se) Edouard Davin (ETHZ, Switzerland - Edouard.Davin@env.ethz.ch Boris Orlowski (ETHZ, Switzerland - [not longer at eth]
Project EMBRACE
References Mueller, B. and Seneviratne, S. I. Geophys. Res. Lett., 41, 128-134, doi:10.1002/2013GL058055 (2014) Mueller, B. et al., Hydrol. Earth Syst. Sci., 17, 3707-3720, doi:10.5194/hess-17-3707-2013 (2013)
This namelist is part of the ESMValTool ###############################################################################

MODELS.model: ESGF_CMIP5 IPSL-CM5A-LR output1 IPSL IPSL-CM5A-LR historical mon atmos Amon r1i1p1 latest 1980 2004 CMIP5_template
ESGF_CMIP5 CanESM2 output1 CCCma CanESM2 historical mon atmos Amon r1i1p1 latest 1980 2004 CMIP5_template
ESGF_CMIP5 CSIRO-Mk3-6-0 output1 CSIRO-QCCCE CSIRO-Mk3-6-0 historical mon atmos Amon r1i1p1 v20110518 1980 2004 CMIP5_template
ESGF_CMIP5 EC-EARTH output1 ICHEC EC-EARTH historical mon atmos Amon r12i1p1 v20120621 1980 2004 CMIP5_template
ESGF_CMIP5 CNRM-CM5 output1 CNRM-CERFACS CNRM-CM5 historical mon atmos Amon r1i1p1 latest 1980 2004 CMIP5_template
ESGF_CMIP5 HadGEM2-ES output1 MOHC HadGEM2-ES historical mon atmos Amon r1i1p1 latest 1980 2004 CMIP5_template
ESGF_CMIP5 GFDL-ESM2M output1 NOAA-GFDL GFDL-ESM2M historical mon atmos Amon r1i1p1 latest 1980 2004 CMIP5_template
ESGF_CMIP5 MIROC5 output1 MIROC MIROC5 historical mon atmos Amon r1i1p1 latest 1980 2004 CMIP5_template
ESGF_CMIP5 MPI-ESM-LR output1 MPI-M MPI-ESM-LR historical mon atmos Amon r1i1p1 latest 1980 2004 CMIP5_template

diag.description: Simple evotranspiration plots using the LandFlux-Eval data set
